_from_moorage_id.description:
Link api.moorages with api.logbook via FOREIGN KEY and REFERENCES

This is a Foreign Key to `moorages.id`.<fk table='moorages' column='id'/>

Link api.moorages with api.logbook via FOREIGN KEY and REFERENCES

Note:
This is a Foreign Key to `moorages.id`.<fk table='moorages' column='id'/>
